QuestData.Title: Riding Shotgun!
QuestData.Description: Alright, $n, I'm very close to learning how to activate the final obelisk.$b$bOnly a few pieces of information are missing and with any luck, we should be able to find them at the site.$b$bThe supplies are all packed up. Let me know when you're ready to go.
QuestData.LogDescription: Accompany Harrison to the Oasis of Vir'sar.
